description:
1990 is a fun, casual RPG filled with laughs and nostalgia. You are a young boy named Sam. You are on a journey to defeat Dr. X, the evil mastermind scientist stereotype we all know and love.

A fun cast of characters:
Sam, the ballplayer

Billy, the techie

Rebecca, the cookie scout

Riley, the family dog


A variety of enemies:


Gambling – Use a slot machine, if that's your thing

A simple, happy story

Controller friendly. You can play the game entirely with just a mouse too.
